items.title: You
items.description: Socialized rendering of the observer, using trained models from the media pipe machine learning API.

items.title: Self
items.description: Presenting the observer to themselves occupying the same space at different times, using the web media API.

items.title: Supra
items.description: A sampling of wave frequencies included in generated bezier curves and written to paper with ink by an axis plotter.

items.title: Singularity
items.description: Processing WEBGL with particle and sound environment.

items.title: Nemesis
items.description: Simplex 4D noise, using a node based graphics network.
